916570.name: Fantasy Grounds - Pathfinder Playtest Map Pack (PFRPG)
916570.description:
Pathfinder Playtest Flip-Mat Multi-Pack

Fight for the Future!
Playtest the new Pathfinder rules in style with this collection of two double-sided Flip-Mats featuring four key encounter areas from the
Pathfinder Playtest Adventure: Doomsday Dawn! Featured areas include a burnt-out crypt under the city of Magnimar, a ruined temple in the demon-infested Worldwound, a wizard's tower beside a remote mountain pool, and an arcanist astronomer's subterranean workshop!
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included Pathfinder 2.0 ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
